message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm asking for $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
